::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
um_uh |> 
  mutate(
    vowel_dur = vowel_end - vowel_start,
        fol_pause = case_when(
          next_seg == "sp" ~ "pause", 
          .default = "no pause"
        )
  ) |> 
  select(idstring, word, fol_pause, vowel_dur) -> 
  pause_data
```
:::
